name: Space Asteroid
description:
Description:

Space Asteroid is a casual 2D shooter game. The player will act as a turret on a planet to protect it from colliding by approaching asteroids. With simple interactions, players can enjoy a relaxing moment of shooting asteroid in space. (Some people argue it's not relaxing at all... but exciting~)

Controls:
LMB = Normal Shoot
RMB = Special Shoot
E = Planet Shield
1/2/3 = Play BGM #1/2/3
P = Next Planet
Esc = Menu Scene / Battle Scene

Features:
     ▪  Diversified Bullet Parameters
     ▪  Random Asteroid Spawn and Moving
     ▪  Energy System
     ▪  Weapon System
     ▪  Menu System (Garage, Map, Settings)
     ▪  Adjustable Enemy Difficulty

See Technical Details:

http://xiangyuwu.net/project%20-%20Space%20Asteroid.html
